prompt:
Nurse: Hold on a second while I figure out how I can best support you. Give me a moment while I figure out how I can best help you.

Patient: I'm fine.

Nurse: When did you first notice the pus and mucus in your stool, Mr. Koroleva?

Patient: Couple weeks ago.

Nurse: Have you had any fever recently, Mr. Koroleva?

Patient: No.

Nurse: Have you noticed any rapid spreading of warmth, swelling, or redness around the area where you've seen the pus and mucus, Mr. Koroleva?

Patient: No.

responses.gpt4: Mr. Koroleva, is the pus and mucus in your stool associated with pain?
responses.our_model: Has the area where you've seen the pus and mucus become larger or more open, Mr. Koroleva?
